keyMoments.title: Reveals Kuma's Protection of the Sunny
keyMoments.description: Franky reveals to the crew that Bartholomew Kuma had been protecting the Thousand Sunny for the past two years, explaining the deal Kuma made with Vegapunk.
keyMoments.significance: Franky serves as the bearer of crucial information that deepens the crew's understanding of Kuma's sacrifice and shows Franky's role in connecting important plot points.
keyMoments.quote: Before Bartholomew Kuma was fully converted into PX-0, he made a deal with Dr. Vegapunk to allow him to include a mission of his own into his programming: to protect the ship of the Straw Hat Pirates until the day one of their members returns.

keyMoments.title: Explains Hatchan and Duval's Injuries
keyMoments.description: Franky explains that Hatchan and Duval sustained heavy injuries fighting the Marines to protect the Thousand Sunny before Kuma arrived.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's awareness of events that transpired during the timeskip and his role as an information conduit for the crew.

reveals.information: Franky learned about Kuma's protection of the Thousand Sunny upon his return to Sabaody

name.japanese: バーソロミュー・くま

keyMoments.title: Kuma's Protection Revealed
keyMoments.description: It is revealed that Kuma protected the Thousand Sunny for two years after making a deal with Vegapunk to program this mission before his full conversion to PX-0.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Kuma's true nature as a secret ally and the depth of his sacrifice for the Straw Hats, transforming understanding of his character from mysterious antagonist to tragic hero.

reveals.information: Kuma made a deal with Vegapunk to protect the Thousand Sunny as his final act before losing his humanity
Kuma protected the Thousand Sunny for two years against Marine attacks

name.japanese: シルバーズ・レイリー

keyMoments.title: Recalls Meeting Gol D. Roger
keyMoments.description: Rayleigh has a flashback to his first meeting with Gol D. Roger while talking with Shakky at the coast where the Straw Hats departed.
keyMoments.significance: Provides important backstory about the legendary partnership between Rayleigh and Roger, and shows Rayleigh's belief that Luffy is worthy of Roger's hat.
keyMoments.quote: Luffy has taken another step towards becoming a man worthy of that hat he wears.

reveals.information: Rayleigh believes Luffy has grown to become more worthy of Roger's straw hat

keyMoments.title: Caribou Attacks Fake Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Caribou attacks the Fake Straw Hats, revealing he joined them to kill the crew from the inside. He demonstrates his Logia-type Numa Numa no Mi powers.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Caribou as a dangerous antagonist with Logia powers and murderous intent toward the real Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: I joined the 'Straw Hat Pirates' so I could kill the crew from the inside!

keyMoments.title: Confirms Logia-Type Devil Fruit
keyMoments.description: Caribou absorbs a cannonball into his swamp body, confirming his Devil Fruit is Logia-based. This is the first Logia-type revealed after the timeskip.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of post-timeskip Devil Fruit powers and establishes the danger level of Caribou's abilities.

keyMoments.title: Caribou Pirates Attack
keyMoments.description: Caribou and his crew attack the Thousand Sunny underwater, attempting to kill the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Caribou as an immediate threat and antagonist for the Fish-Man Island arc.

abilities.description: Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows Caribou to create, control, and transform into swamp/mud, making him a Swamp Human. Can absorb attacks and objects into his body.

reveals.information: Caribou possesses the Logia-type Numa Numa no Mi (Swamp-Swamp Fruit)
Caribou joined the fake Straw Hats with the intention of killing the crew from the inside

keyMoments.title: Reports to Marine Headquarters
keyMoments.description: Sentomaru reports to Marine Headquarters in the New World about capturing Demaro Black and warns them about the Straw Hats' return and newfound strength.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes that the Marines are aware of the Straw Hats' return and their increased power level, setting up future confrontations.
keyMoments.quote: Call Marine Headquarters in the New World and warn them that the Straw Hats have finally returned.

reveals.information: Sentomaru witnessed the Straw Hats' increased strength and easily destroying two Pacifistas

keyMoments.title: Explains Bubble Coating Mechanics
keyMoments.description: Nami explains to the crew how the bubble coating works, describing how it has the same properties as the bubbles on Sabaody Archipelago.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's role as the crew's navigator and her technical knowledge about their journey.
keyMoments.quote: A coated ship has all the same properties of the bubbles on the Sabaody Archipelago. They will expand until a certain point before letting an object go through the bubble.
